TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MetadataExchangeClient extends System.Object

summary.span: 下載服務中繼資料。

span.span: Downloads service metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 來下載中繼資料。Use the to download metadata. 一般而言， 會設定為中繼資料要求，然後傳遞至 或 方法，讓 用於下載中繼資料。Typically, a is configured for a metadata request and then passed to the or method for the to use to download metadata. 不過，您可以直接使用 來擷取做為包含 物件之 的中繼資料。However, you can use the directly to retrieve metadata as a that contains objects. 無論直接使用或傳遞至 ， 具有下列成員可以控制中繼資料下載程序：Whether used directly or passed to a , has the following members to control the metadata download process: - 您可以使用建構函式來自訂提出中繼資料要求時使用的繫結。Use the constructors to customize the binding to use when making the metadata request. - 您可以使用 屬性來指定用來提出 HTTP/GET 要求的認證。Use the property to specify the credentials used to make an HTTP/GET request. - 您可以使用 屬性來指定用來提出 WS-Transfer 中繼資料要求的認證。Use the property to specify the credentials used to make a WS-Transfer metadata request. - 您可以使用 屬性來限制 解析的中繼資料參考數目。Use the property to limit the number of metadata references the resolves. - 您可以使用 屬性來限制擷取中繼資料所花費的時間。Use the property to limit the time spent retrieving metadata. - 您可以使用 屬性來指定是否尋找和擷取其他中繼資料文件，這些文件是由自原始中繼資料端點下載的中繼資料所參考。Use the property to specify whether to locate and retrieve other metadata documents referred to by the metadata downloaded from the original metadata endpoint. - 您可以使用 方法來開始下載程序。Use the methods to begin the downloading process. 此外，您還可以建立覆寫下列兩個受保護方法的衍生類別：In addition, you can create a derived class that can override the following two protected methods: - 覆寫 方法，以修改使用 WS-Transfer 提出中繼資料要求的通道。Override the method to modify the channel that makes a metadata request using WS-Transfer. - 覆寫 方法，以修改使用 HTTP/GET 提出中繼資料要求的 。Override the method to modify the that makes a metadata request using HTTP/GET. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示如何使用 以指定下載繫結、解析任何包含的中繼資料參考，以及下載中繼資料。The following code example shows the use of to specify a download binding, resolve any contained references to metadata, and download the metadata. [!code-csharp[MetadataResolver#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/metadataresolver/cs/client.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int MaximumResolvedReferences { get; set; }
.property instance int32 MaximumResolvedReferences
Public Property MaximumResolvedReferences As Integer
public: property int MaximumResolvedReferences { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 下載之中繼資料參考的最大數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of references to metadata that the downloads.

value.span: 解析的中繼資料參考數目。

span.span: The number of metadata references the resolves.
The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 屬性來限制包含大量參考之中繼資料所存取的資源。Use the property to limit the resources accessed by metadata that contains a large number of references. 這個限制將套用至會產生後續要求之中繼資料中的任何參考，包括中繼資料參考、中繼資料位置、WSDL 匯入以及 XML 結構描述 Import 和 Include。This limit applies to any reference in the metadata that results in a subsequent request, including metadata references, metadata locations, WSDL imports, and XML Schema imports and includes.

MemberSignature.Value: public TimeSpan OperationTimeout { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.TimeSpan OperationTimeout
Public Property OperationTimeout As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan OperationTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在擲回例外狀況之前必須下載中繼資料的期間。

span.span: Gets or sets the period of time within which the metadata must be downloaded before an exception is thrown.

value.span: 必須下載中繼資料的期間。預設為 1 分鐘。

span.span: The period within which the metadata must be downloaded; the default is 1 minute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 屬性來限制 在作業結束之前佔用的時間量。Use the property to limit the amount of time the takes before ending the operation.
